components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Beeline Network in Tajikistan

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Beeline network in Tajikistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failure To A Subset Of Twilio Phone Numbers In El Salvador

incident_updates.body: We are still observing inbound call failures to a subset of Twilio phone numbers in El Salvador. We are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery for Inbound Call Failure To A Subset Of Twilio Phone Numbers In El Salvador. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Latin America

incident_updates.body: The issue causing inbound Call Failures To A Subset Of Twilio Phone Numbers In El Salvador has been identified. We are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Latin America

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays From Twilio Long-Code Numbers to US Carriers

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery from Twilio Long-Code at this time. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring shows overall improvement in carrier-side traffic congestion, and we are observing instant MMS delivery from Twilio Long-Code at this time. We will continue monitoring the overall US carrier networks to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring shows overall improvement in carrier-side traffic congestion, and we are observing instant MMS delivery from Twilio Long-Code at this time. We will continue monitoring the overall US carrier networks to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in the US. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in the US. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body:
Please find the current MMS delivery status from Twilio long codes for the major carriers below:

AT&T (status - Operational)
T-Mobile (status - Operational)
Verizon (status - Operational)
MetroPCS (status - Operational)
US Cellular (status - Operational)
CSpire (status - Delayed) Small Networks  

We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as we have any new information to share.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body:
Due to sustained high traffic on the US carrier networks, we are currently experiencing MMS delivery delays from Twilio Long-Code numbers. Messages are queued due to capacity shortage, and customers may see delays when sending to certain US carriers.

Please find the current delivery status for the major carriers below:

AT&T (status - Operational)
T-Mobile (status - Operational)
Verizon (status - Operational)
MetroPCS (status - Operational)
US Cellular (status - Operational)
CSpire (status - Delayed) Small Networks

We are actively working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as we have any new information to share.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring shows overall improvement in carrier-side traffic congestion, and we are observing instant MMS delivery from Twilio Long-Code numbers at this time. We will continue monitoring the overall US carrier networks to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body:
Due to sustained high traffic on the US carrier networks, we are currently experiencing MMS delivery delays from Twilio Long-Code numbers. Messages are queued due to capacity shortage, and customers may see delays when sending to certain US carriers.

Please find the current delivery status for the major carriers below:

AT&T (status - Operational)
T-Mobile (status - Operational)
Verizon (status - Operational)
MetroPCS (status - Operational)
US Cellular (status - Operational)
CSpire (status - Delayed) Small Networks

We are actively working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as we have any new information to share.
